sentences.en: A Genome is the name for the full complement of genes in an organism.
sentences.cn: 基因组是指某一生物的全部基因.
麻省理工学院基因研究小组, 2001.

sentences.en: As genomes grew in length, internal selection began to rule the genome.
sentences.cn: 随着基因组长度的增长, 内部选择开始控制基因组.

sentences.en: Climbing Mount Genome - i . e . sequencing the full complement of human DNA -- was actually rather easy.
sentences.cn: 爬上基因组高山,也就是测定人类DNA的全部序列, 实际上相当容易.

sentences.en: Genome - based Celera Genomics, the private company involved in the effort.
sentences.cn: 赛莱拉基因组学公司是对此项研究做出贡献的私人公司.

sentences.en: It's a virtual gold rush to mine the mountain of potentially valuable data the genome contains.
sentences.cn: 基因组蕴含着潜在的有价值的资料,开凿这座大山,才叫真正的淘金热.

sentences.en: Repeated sequences are often present in the genome.
sentences.cn: 基因组内常常有重复性序列.

sentences.en: Researchers just mapped the genome of a female platypus from Australia.
sentences.cn: 最近,研究人员们为一直来自澳大利亚的雌性鸭嘴兽绘制了基因图.

sentences.en: Satellite DNAs were first detected as distinct subfractions of the genome.
sentences.cn: 最初检测的随体DNA被 当成为基因组的不同亚组分.

sentences.en: Scientists have decoded the dog genome.
sentences.cn: 科学家已经译解了狗的基因组。

sentences.en: The biggest boost to the business came from mapping the human genome.
sentences.cn: 这一产业的最大动力,来自于人类基因组绘图.

sentences.en: The human genome is a map of our genetic structure.
sentences.cn: 人类基因组是我们遗传结构的图谱.

sentences.en: The killer mould behind potato blight has a giant genome, say scientists.
sentences.cn: 科学家称,导致马铃薯疫病的霉菌有一组巨大的基因.

sentences.en: The primary structure of globin moiety is determined by the plant genome.
sentences.cn: 球蛋白一半的最初构造决定于植物的染色体组.

sentences.en: They were comparing notes on each other's progress towards solving that most taxing of all puzzles: the riddle of the human genome.
sentences.cn: 他们就解决人类所面临的最大难题，即人类基因组之谜的进展情况交换了意见。

phrases.tran_cn: 染色体组分析，基因组分析

trans.tran_en: all the  genes  in one type of living thing
